code: import React,{useState,useEffect,useMemo}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Animationtext=()=>{const titles=useMemo(()=>["Executive Landmarks","Innovative Architecture","Modern Business Spaces"],[]);const[text,setText]=useState("");const[index,setIndex]=useState(0);const[subIndex,setSubIndex]=useState(0);const[deleting,setDeleting]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{if(subIndex===titles[index].length+1&&!deleting){setTimeout(()=>setDeleting(true),1000);return;}if(subIndex===0&&deleting){setDeleting(false);setIndex(prev=>(prev+1)%titles.length);return;}const timeout=setTimeout(()=>{setSubIndex(prev=>deleting?prev-1:prev+1);setText(titles[index].substring(0,subIndex));},deleting?60:120);return()=>clearTimeout(timeout);},[subIndex,index,deleting,titles]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{style:{fontWeight:600,color:"#661414",textAlign:"center",padding:"2rem 0",minHeight:"2rem",whiteSpace:"nowrap",overflow:"hidden",borderRight:"2px solid #661414",width:"fit-content",margin:"0 auto"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{style:{display:"inline-block",transition:"opacity 0.3s ease-in-out, transform 0.3s ease-in-out",opacity:1,transform:deleting?"translateY(-2px)":"translateY(0)"},children:text})});};export default Animationtext;
